title: Oblivion Song by Kirkman & de Felici, Vol. 6
description: A decade ago, 300,000 citizens of Philadelphia were suddenly lost in Oblivion. Now, history has repeated itself. Three more cities have swapped dimensions, igniting a final war between humans and Ghozan. The final six issues are collected here!Collects OBLIVION SONG #31-36
author: Robert Kirkman
